talk.author: did:plc:2qsizws3cqz2jdnn5prfs5r6
talk.utter: I’m going to keep repeating this in hopes that it gets shared and talked about, ad nauseam.  Laws can (and likely will) continue to change in the effort of removing rights and creating a caste divide. What will your line be? When it’s illegal migrants?  When it’s trans? When it’s gay? When

talk.author: did:plc:tuywvwb5dkm42dcbsvy4bbmk
talk.utter: Listen my line is right now. I am Latina and gay. I’m doomed. I am a citizen born here but still. The line has already been drawn for me. That’s just me but it’s drawn.
